entry.title: Warheads Sour Green Apple Cotton Candy - 1.75oz

entry.title: Rowntree's Randoms Foamies Pouch - 140g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nestle UK
Type: Candy
Price: 4.59

Completely Unpredictable!

Like a fluffy pillow for your mouth!

Rowntree's® Randoms Foamies boast a fun and random assortment of gummy candies! Originally from the UK, this package of delightfully foamy sweet flavoured treats is a perfect snack for all ages. With prominnet flavours of strawberry biscuit and ice-cream biscuit. From ping-pong paddles to paintbrushes, ice cream cones to saxophones, every bag contains billions of possible combinations of textures, shapes, colours and flavours. You never know what you're going to get! 


140 g

entry.title: Doritos Twisted Lime - 18.8oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: Frito-Lay Inc
Type: Snacks
Price: 14.99

BACK FOR A LIMITED TIME

The Long-Awaited Return of...

 Doritos Twisted Lime 

American Snacks | Potato Chips

If you love Doritos, you must try these! With a citrusy flavour and a sour bite at the end, your mouth will be watering. The bag is so big which makes it the perfect movie night snack to munch on. Doritos released this new flavour last year and they definitely were a fan favourite. This time they are back and very exclusive...


Don't wait any longer! Order today and discover what you've been missing out on!

1 family size bag - 18.8oz

Fresh Snacks Shipped Within Canada & to USA! 

Ingredients

Corn Flour, Vegetable Oil (Corn, Canola, and/or Sunflower), Salt, Cheddar Cheese (Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Whey, Spices, Maltodextrin (Made From Corn), Monosodium Glutamate, Buttermilk, Romano Cheese (Cow’s Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Natural and Artificial Flavors, Onion Powder, Baking Soda, Whey Protein Concentrate, Tomato Powder, Citric Acid, Garlic Powder, Potassium Chloride, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Monoglycerides, Artificial Color (Yellow 6, Yellow 5, Yellow 6 Lake, Blue 2 Lake), Disodium Inosinate, and Disodium Guanylate. CONTAINS MILK INGREDIENTS.

entry.title: Sour Punch Mini Bites Assorted Pouch - 3.5oz
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Licorice
Type: Candy
Price: 3.49

Embrace Your Punch

Sour Punch Mini Bites Assorted Flavours 

Enjoy Sour Punches iconic straws in mini form! 3 flavors of sour candy per bag: Blue Raspberry, Green Apple & Strawberry.

These soft & chewy candy bites are covered in the classic sour sugar coating and come in small bite-sized pieces. What is awesome about this candy is that it comes in a resealable bag! It will perfectly fit in your backpack or purse for a on-the-go snack. You can even try pairing these sour fruity candies with a snack like popcorn!

  • Low Fat
  • Low Sodium
  • Kosher & Halal Certified

3.5oz

For that Great Homemade Taste, Try Grandma's®

    Remember the homestyle baking that you were treated to as a kid with these delicious Grandma's Vanilla Mini Sandwich Cremes! Buttery mini golden cookies filled with a smooth vanilla creme, these bite-sized snacks are the perfect treat for all ages. Sure to give you a sweet taste that's both nostalgic and scrumptious, you might not be able to put this bag down until it's empty! Just try your best to share, it's what Grandma would have wanted.

entry.title: Chips Ahoy! Hershey's Fudge Filled Cookies
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nabisco
Type: Snacks
Price: 9.99

Soft, Chewy, and Filled with Fudge!

     Nothing hits the spot better than a soft, well-baked chocolate chip cookie, but we think there's something that can top even that. These delicious cookies are stuffed to the edges with smooth Hershey's Chocolate Fudge; an indulgent treat you don't want to miss out on!

     Each bite is a blend of buttery cookie and tons of rich chocolate that will swirl around your tastebuds, giving you the perfect cookie experience that you've been searching for. Chips Ahoy! Hershey's Fudge Filled Cookies are only available for a limited time, so hurry and grab some while they're still hot!

     Don't just stop at munching them right out of the box! These cookies are the perfect addition in an over-the-top sundae dessert, or even just heated up and letting the warm chocolate ooze onto your tongue. However you decide to enjoy them, these are certainly an unforgettable treat!

9.6oz / 272g | 1 pack
